name.baseName: Ice cream ; Water, white sugar, milk powder, etc. ; Blending + homogenization, sterilization + cooling + aging + freezing + hardening + packaging ; 5000~30000 t/a; NESPS2
冰淇淋 ; 水、白砂糖、乳粉等 ; 配料+均质、杀菌+冷却+老化+凝冻+硬化+包装 ; 0.5-3万吨/年 ; 全国第二次污染普查数据

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution chemical oxygen demandisPhysical treatment + anaerobic biological treatment + aerobic biological treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management98

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution chemical oxygen demandisPhysical treatment + anaerobic biological treatment + aerobic biological treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management98
technology.technologicalApplicability: 该工业过程描述了冰淇淋的生产阶段，包括使用水、白砂糖和乳粉等配料。该过程包括冰淇淋的混合、均质、杀菌、冷却、老化、凝冻、硬化和包装，年产量在5000至30000吨之间。它还包括了一种用于处理化学需氧量、氨氮和有机结合氮污染的末端处理技术，通过物理处理以及厌氧加好氧生物处理，分别达到了98%、73%和67%的处理效率。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 第二次全国污染源普查产排污核算系数手册（试用版）,二级代码14,四级代码1493文件，在完整版文件中第3413页

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This dataset is derived from the Pollution Source Census Report and contains information on pollution emissions and related products. However, it does not include data on energy or chemical consumption, nor does it provide information on waste or co-product generation. When utilizing this dataset, please supplement the missing data based on actual conditions before use
该数据集来源于污染源普查报告，包含污染物排放及相关产品信息，但不包含能源或化学品消耗数据，也不提供废弃物或共生产物产生信息。在使用该数据集时，请根据实际情况补充缺失数据后再使用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

common:referenceToPersonOrEntityGenerati.common:shortDescription: The data was created by the Office of the Second National Pollution Source Census of the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, and the data was organized by the TianGong Plan team for ILCD format
生态环境部第二次全国污染源普查工作办公室创建数据，天工计划团队常慧敏整理数据为ILCD格式

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: 源文件中描述为为冰淇淋，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为化学需氧量

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Ammonia NitrogenisPhysical treatment + anaerobic biological treatment + aerobic biological treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management73
污染物指标氨氮的末端治理技术是物理处理法+厌氧生物处理法+好氧生物处理法，其效率为73，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=污水处理设施年耗电量（千瓦时）/(总额定功率(千瓦)×年运行时间(小时))。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为氨氮，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为氨氮

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Ammonia NitrogenisPhysical treatment + anaerobic biological treatment + aerobic biological treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management73
污染物指标氨氮的末端治理技术是物理处理法+厌氧生物处理法+好氧生物处理法，其效率为73，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=污水处理设施年耗电量（千瓦时）/(总额定功率(千瓦)×年运行时间(小时))。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为氨氮，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为氨氮

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Nitrogen, organic boundisPhysical treatment + anaerobic biological treatment + aerobic biological treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management67
污染物指标总氮的末端治理技术是物理处理法+厌氧生物处理法+好氧生物处理法，其效率为67，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=污水处理设施年耗电量（千瓦时）/(总额定功率(千瓦)×年运行时间(小时))。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为总氮，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为总氮

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution chemical oxygen demandisPhysical treatment + anaerobic biological treatment + aerobic biological treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management98
污染物指标化学需氧量的末端治理技术是物理处理法+厌氧生物处理法+好氧生物处理法，其效率为98，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=污水处理设施年耗电量（千瓦时）/(总额定功率(千瓦)×年运行时间(小时))。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为化学需氧量，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为化学需氧量
